title: I can't believe this is real..

comments.comment: That first one was by far one of the best pewdiepie clips I've ever seen. Props to the guy that made it.
I wasn't expecting historical rapbattles of history bars with Jack and pewds but glad we got them
"I know the real ones will stay" aight that made me tear up. We're always here for you pewds <3

It's weird, seeing Felix progress through his life is like watching my brother grow up, the weirdest part about it is, he doesn't know me AT ALL. The internet is a surreal place. I am happy to be here for as long as I have! 


Stay humble Felix, you're an inspiration!

i love this channel. felix, and even jack and mark have gotten to the point where they can just post content they actually want to make rather than the stuff that gets clicks and views. watching the videos felix makes now, it feels so much more like he's a real person now, then he did back in his "awkward phase"

Felix is one of those people who I think grows WITH his audience.  His ability to evolve and change his content over the years as his audience does the same is what keeps him authentic and what keeps people along for the ride.  Been watching Pewds since middle school and I'm in college now :,)

It’s so weird to see all of the comments that Felix was so much better in the past, I remember I watched him so much while I was growing up but as I got older, I grew away from his older content. Recently when I started back watching him, I was so happy to see that he was making content that he wanted to and it’s always so nice to see a YouTuber growing with you.

I used to watch you when I was 14-15.  I’m gonna be 27 this year. 

The brofist got to me because I remember going through some rough stuff at the time and watching your videos to cheer me up. I would even brofist the screen back because you replaced my tears with a smile. 

Love you Pewds.
The reason his channel never died is because people watch him for him, for of his personality, so no matter what he does we still enjoy watching him anyway.

The reason people stay is because of his personality, not the type of video he makes. I wouldn't watch anyone else do a wish video for example, but when Felix does it it's entertaining and also one of those videos you look forward to watching. Don't get me wrong, it's a nice concept which of course counts, but personality does so much. It's interesting how you can watch the same person for years and not get tired of it.

There were years where Felix really seemed depressed. And that makes these videos where he does what he likes and seems genuinely in a good place even more engaging. Thanks for hanging in there Pewds. Where you are is amazing.

This video just really highlights how wholesome Felix is as a person. The fact that he remembers interactions proves that he genuinely cares about the people he interacts with and he doesn't just see them as annoying fans. Love it. What a guy. What a pal.
it's honestly really nice to see how calm and relaxed felix is nowadays.
The way Felix presents himself in his videos is casual yet entertaining. I find it very admirable.

I personally have never enjoyed your content more than I do now. I've watched you for almost your whole time on YouTube (my cousin showed you to me when I was around 11 and I immediately enjoyed your presence) and you've never seemed happier than you do now. I love seeing you enjoying your own content, it makes everything more fun to watch!
This man isn't following the "popular" youtube trends but still manages to be really entertaining
Felix didn't change he just grew up, thats why we love him

"I know the real ones will stay"

I've been watching Felix since 2012 and I have legit tears in my eyes. I'm so happy he enjoys making videos with the content he wants to do and that he's not holding back from uploading them for the sake of playing the Youtube game. I just want him to be happy

I subscribed to you in 2013 and you were one of the first people I followed on youtube. Now that I'm 24 I can relate to you more and more and it's so cool to watch you grow as a person. Thanks to you I started reading books again, learned English,  played some good games you introduced us to and I still have so much fun watching you. I will surely stay here for as long as you upload

as someone who's been around since the COD days, its really cool to see how felix has grown, and has found his "niche". Felix has been such a big part of my childhood & early adulthood and i love that his content has evolved the way it has.

Just 2 years ago the comment section was full with memes and trolls, not even thinking about saying something nice for the video.

Now everyone tells how they appreciate felix and enjoy his much more relaxing videos, some tell their stories, how they overcame their hard past, one is cheering up the other. It's so wholsome, I can't help but smile reading all these comments. :')
Love this chill Pewds man so wholesome
That intro rap was dope XD
Honestly, Felix makes ads that are actually so amusing that i WANT to listen all the way through!
Been a sub long enough to know that Pewd's vids are at their best when he is just making whatever the fuck makes him happy. Guaranteed good content every time
It’s been a while since I’ve watched one of your vids but I came across this and enjoyed it and the brofist made me tear up a bit

This dude doesn't follow trends.
He creates it.

I’ve been following him since 2010. That’s 12 years man. If anything you taught to keep that smile no matter what. Your personality and humor alone got so many through it. A butterfly that has touched so many lives and continues to. I’m glad to see you come to this phase where you do what you like
We will still watch him when we are in our 80s this man is so entertaining
I love this type of content. I'd rather have an upload once a week or 2 and have it be Felix enjoying himself then everyday and have him burning out. You go Felix. Pewdiepie fan forever
I love both the current chill and previous chaotic feel of the videos, at the end of the day I still appreciate the stuff and just as love pewd's videos

Oddly enough I started watching Pewds with my daughter who introduced me to his channel when she was a teen. It was my way to bond with her. We used to sit on the couch in the dark and watch his Amnesia vids lol. She's 23 now and recently moved out. We dont watch his content together anymore but still chat about what we've watched when we get a chance to catch up over dinner or something. Crazy how time flies. Thx for the jump scares Felix and the fun memories.
That song at the beginning is a banger
Trending number 10 for gaming lmao as he is just doing what he wants. Just so awesome to see. Keep doing you man been watching since 2014 and won't stop till you do!
I feel like the fact that we still watch pewdiepie to this day even when we are growing older is because it feels like he is growing old with us. His content seems to get more mature as he ages.
The fact that you can see him change over the years shows that he is genuine and he doesn't just stick to a persona that isn't him just for views and I love this about him

"The real ones stay".   Never played video games, am female & prob not many years younger than your mom, tbh.   I've also watched & been a subscriber from your start here on YT.    Just do whatever makes YOU happy!   It's your personality, integrity & humility that keeps people watching.   Stay safe & be well.
"Question? Answer. Problem? Fix it" - The Philosodiepie

I absolutely love how he‘s creating content he likes and enjoys, not following any trends or dumb challenges. His videos are so much more authentic yet still entertaining, which makes me like his videos even more. Let’s admit it, he could post anything and we would still watch it, his personality is everything. Thank you for creating amazing videos. Brofist ️

almost teared up when he said "i know the real ones will stay" because he knows some people will stop watching because he's not playing the youtube game anymore, but we will still be here Poods. brofist
Just wanted to let Pewds know that tomorrow is April 20th which means that the date would be 4-20. Just wanted to bless him with that knowledge.

I find it really amazing that Felix can still engage with an audience that has grown up watching him. I used to watch him when I was around 13-14, now I'm 23 and I still really enjoy his content. Keep it up!
"I know that it isn't playing the YouTube game" pewds you ARE the YouTube to me. I enjoy watching every single video you put out no matter what the topic is. Brofist️
God bless the guy who made the interaction so awkward pewds remembered him "yOuRE the NorWEgIAN"
I love to hear off topic real life advises from Felix.
Pewds always looks so legit when he's talking off topic

I'm one of those people who started watching when I was 12 lol. I'd watch every one of your vids religiously for years . Pewds literally shaped my sense of humor and I can't thank him enough. I'm 23 now, and it's funny how you retiring brought me back from watching every now and then to waiting for an upload like I used to. We love the genuine videos! Keep at it and brofist!!
I don't know why watching this "simple" can give me such a joy feeling I almost teared up. Hope he still makes videos forever
8:08 forshadowing

started watching pewds probably 9 or 10 years ago, longest i’ve ever stuck with a creator. I can’t say i’m not sad to see less videos from him, but i will always be grateful for him being a random constant in my life that i could depend upon to make me happy. Stickin with you til the end senpai

I didn't realize how many people have found PewDiePie during elementary/middle school, and are now in college/starting families/ becoming an adult and still watching everyday. Myself included! Felix has been a huge part of my growing up. Even when I wasn't spending much time on YouTube, I would still come for his uploads to cheer me up
1:03 this song so cool, I love it

Been a fan since I was 6, now I'm 17. Always loved the content Felix makes. Maturing up along with the videos, it's really a fun journey. Now or back then, Felix will forever be the best content creator I'll ever cherish.
I’m just over here thinking about how this man has managed to make me laugh even when I’ve wanted to die in every major depressive episode for the past 7 years. Love you pewds.

I absolutely appreciate you doing the stuff you actually want to do. I could not have fathomed that this man that I saw for the first time yelling at his screen with a thick accent would one day talk to us about interesting stuff he came upon while delving in philosophy. And by that I mean, it wasn't the trend. Gameplay channels would remain gameplay channels or otherwise just do whatever else was trending on the social platforms. 

It's a breath of fresh air to be surprised again and again by whatever you feel like doing on your channel. Thank you very much for inspiring so many of us. Like, bro, you got some of us into working out. How great is that? You got some of us to read for joy.
0:00 Dragon PewDiePie

2:02
Pewds : "And it's not just Putting The Work, Putting The Hours-"
The Rock : "But also Taking What's Ours"

I cannot stress how much I love Felix’s videos. He is truly one of the most inspirational and genuine people I have the opportunity to be a fan of. Like many others I’m sure, got a bit emo when he mentioned that real ones would stay. We all appreciate and love the heck out of you and your videos Felix!!

if i can watch felix’s videos and know that in every one he had a good time making it, that would be all the better. he’s played the youtube meta for way too long and i’m happy to see him finally just enjoy himself making videos.
That rap at the start was insanely good for putting random clips together. wtf lol
11:28 sounds like the action lab guy, maybe
idk why but we gotta admit, it's fun watching pewdiepie doing whatever he does and him being genuine about it.
2:26 "Who Won, who lost, YOU DECIDE!. Epic Rap Battles of History "

Watching Felix is like talking to a best friend, you always enjoy hanging with them, it's so chill yet so fun and calming. And it never gets old, you always stay the same throughout the years. Thank you for being like this :) i love you wholeheartedly

You will always be the king of YouTube, you left a mark in this platform and in many people lives, a positive marc you should be proud of cause you are amazing and as strange as it sounds many people care for you and love and they haven't even met you but dude, they saw your vids for 12 years of course they feel like you are part of their family already, it's a really interesting thing to analyze.

"I know the real ones will stay" 
- Felix Kjellberg, 2022

it's crazy that i've been watching felix for 10 years already now that i think about it, and i was one of those 12 year olds too hahaha. i really appreciate the days where his content really made me forget the horrible and heavy feelings i used to go through, i still enjoy it now even if it's so relaxed and fun. i'll always support you throughout your journey, felix!

I’ve been watching since 2013, Smosh was king, pewdiepie dark souls 3 was unfinished, now sitting at 19 I can humbly say this man can quit at anytime and still be the greatest YouTuber of all time. We will always luv you pewds
i love how real his videos are. he makes the content he enjoys and is just himself. keep doing what you want to do pewds cuz we'll always watch!!

I've been going through a lot of mental struggles lately and experiencing loneliness, and watching the bros videos, like PewDiePie, Jack, and Markiplier, always uplifts my day. I especially appreciate the Brofist at the end- even though I'm not actually talking to Pewds, that simple interaction makes me feel like I am actually there with him. It makes me feel less lonely each time and I am grateful for that :)

"Can't Hear"
"Can't Talk"
"Can't go to Japan" 

Well that escalated quickly

Been aware of your existance, as the king of youtube, since forever but never quite clicked with the content. The algo let me to you again and honestly, not sure if it's the change in your content or me having changed, but I really like what you're putting out nowadays. Wish you all the best!
These real things are absolutely incredible! It's insane how far Felix has come!

We appreciate you so much more when you’re being yourself. This’ll always remain the best channel on YouTube, even if one day you decide to stop uploading videos. You’re a big part of all of us and our childhoods. We love you pewds ️️

Felix.. this probably wont happen, but dude, if you dropped all the way down to 1000 subscribers, I would still be one of them. 

I just enjoy you as a person man, genuinely and the videos you do where you have fun, those are fantastic to me.

Too many people forget what YouTube was meant to be, sure it isnt what it is anymore, but, it had the purpose of being a social platform... not strictly for entertaining.

I think it's cool when we get a glimpse into the things you are passionate for or just generally interested in, it let's us know you a little more as a human. 

You arent just my entertainment man..
I'm sure many other people share that same sentiment. So keep doing you my guy, no matter what, many of us will always be here.

I too started watching your channel when I was 12. I’m 23 now and cannot believe it’s been over a decade. I will never forget the nostalgia of watching hours upon hours of hilarious play-throughs. The content that’s created now emboldens me to see how much we’ve all grown and I appreciate the fact that you stay true to yourself Pewds. Thanks for being a great light in our lives throughout the years
0:18 so much better at 1.5x speed
1:39 SHEESH

"I know the real ones will stay"
one of the best lines of felix

I really enjoy the wish videos and collabs with ken you guys have good chemistry. Would be great if you and ken did a wish thing together where each of you bought your own items but same category and then compared them.

Felix and friends will forever be a happy part of my childhood and I will always be so grateful to have the privilege to have grown up with all of you and your channels. Some of
The hardest moments in my life have been consoled by your content and given me laughs when i needed that comfort the most. I cant thank you and the gang enough for doing what you do Felix. Much love from Virginia, USA ️
It's been awhile since I watched your videos, I'm currently binging them rn and it's good to see you just hanging out and doing what you want. Love u Pewds
Man u touched my heart ‘the real ones will stay’ i m always telling my lil bro the same thing
12:03 - The channel is called Action Lab
Every time I look at him, i go- i love him so much. I'm so grateful for him.

It never ceases to amaze me how Felix can be a chameleon, always evolving, adapting, changing and it works so well because the world is in constant change. He changed his logo, colours, sense of humour... And as a person that has been following this adorable asshole since 2013, I must say: he's one of the most incredible people I have the pleasure to say that inspire me. Thanks, Felix. Being authentic nowadays can be really hard and you're constantly showing that it's totally worth it.
Pewds thanks for the content, you're one of my favorite creators much love

I think felix has really been the one constant in my life I can always go back to. ever since I was in early middle school to now about to graduate high school, watching his videos has become a routine I can’t live outside of. my family has been going through a really insane, distressing time recently (like buzzfeed unsolved insane) and pewds videos never fail to lift my spirits. cant even express how grateful I am for felix :)
- much love from a fellow swede
Pewdiepie, one of the few creators who has the literal ability to grow and evolve over the years. Been watching you 4 years now :)

Since the day i subscribed i've looked forward to every pewds upload, these days i'm even more excited knowing he's passionate about the video or just having fun. It's been a crazy journey so far and i hope this is still just the beginning, thanks for uploading Felix :)

3:56 
pewds - Is that popcorn.
We Indians - no....those are peanuts that's how it's done in India.

13:06 “no country is perfect”
Sweden: doubt
That Jacksepticeye vs Pewdiepie ERB was unironically fire
